description:
Learn How 2 Dance - Salsa (shines/footwork) is for salsa dancers who want to take their dancing to a new level. Each lesson is a new shine that you can take to the dance floor.

This course is a MUST TAKE if you want to dazzle your partner and make an awesome impression.

Time to get out there and own the dance floor!
title: Learn How 2 Dance - Salsa (Shines/Footwork)
